title: Hairpin
description: hairpin, three stones, garnet, obsidion, blue stone in swastika, Ling-Chich, ribbons and oak leaves (symbols of immortality), with stamped vine motif on pin stem;  cast gold stem with stamping and filigree.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles S. Pillsbury, Phillip Winston Pillsbury, Mary Stinson Pillsbury Lord, Katherine Stevens Pillsbury McKee and Helen Winston Pillsbury Becker in memory of Charles S. Pillsbury
